2025-02-20.verse: John 3:16 - For God so loved the world...
2025-02-20.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
2025-02-20.reflections: Had a productive day, completed most of the tasks.
2025-02-20.chanting: Chanted 108 times in the morning and evening.
